column4: I'm downloading azureus... There's linux GTK, linux Motif, linux PPC... And I don't know what those mean... I have hoary hedgehog, which of those should i download?

gtk means it's using GTK+ & GNOME environment, which is default on ubuntu (on kubuntu it's KDE); linux motif is a safe bet when you don't have any advanced environments, linux ppc is for linux boxes on powerpc processor
